=== About Me ===

Hi ! I am Negative Thunder,mostly called me "Negative" . I am from Mandalay,Myanmar.
I am Civil Engineering Student from Technology University Mandalay.
I am working as Web Designer and Web Developer in Pizza Technology.
I am interested in Linux , Coding , Hacking and Security.

=== Ubuntu and Me ===

I met with Ubuntu in 2010. Ubuntu 10.10 is the first Ubuntu distro I used.But I met Ubuntu Myanmar LoCo Team in 2011. In Facebook,I met "Ko Ko Ye",Team Leader of Ubuntu Myanmar LoCo Team.I told him to make an Ubuntu Event in Mandalay. This is How I met Ubuntu and Become a Member of Ubuntu Myanmar LoCo Team. From there,I was starting to help Ubuntu Myanmar LoCo Team and Contribute Ubuntu.

==== 2013 ====

1. Ubuntu Intermediate Class Mandalay {*}
     Event link ->http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-mm/2386-ubuntu-intermediate-class-mandalay/
     .Photo ->http://www.flickr.com/photos/chitko/9211116847/in/pool-ubuntu-mm

In this class we collected the Ubuntu user who were already touching with ubuntu. In class, taught about advance CLI usage, SSH configuration and network utility and Ubuntu server.

2. Barcamp Mandalay {*}
     Event link ->http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-mm/2209-barcamp-mandalay-2013/
     .Photo ->http://www.flickr.com/photos/chitko/8428777022/in/pool-ubuntu-mm/

In Barcamp Mandalay I'm volunteer. We made a Ubuntu Corner and help everyone who insterest in it such as installation in there laptop and sharing Ubuntu Ebook. Also show Respberry Pi, Ubuntu touch and QR usage.

3. Ubuntu Global Jam Mandalay {*}
     Event link ->http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-mm/2279-ubuntu-global-jam-mandalay/

This event was made in Mandaly City Hall. I and core member from Mandaly made a Ubuntu Desk. Share Ubuntu 12.04 LTS version and show Ubuntu Phablet with Galaxy Nexus.

4. Ubuntu and Security Camp at Computer University Mandalay {*}
     Photo ->https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=3131945313590&set=pb.1713503519.-2207520000.1373464424.1&type=3&theater

In this event I and core member from Mandalay went to the Computer University and introduce the students with Ubuntu. Show them linux history, usage, tweak, compiz, desktop enviroment.
